title: #224 - Henry Phillips & ME
description:
Comedian Henry Phillips & I hang out in the Mancave and share our favorite road stories regarding our favorite comics, he talks about how he meet Doug Stanhope, how his dad almost played the role of Coach on Cheers, and his new movie on airing now on NETFLIX, "Punching Henry".

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron - to get Three Free MEALS w/ Free Shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought you by www.stamps.com - CLICK on the Radio Microphone on the top of the homepage and use the my name "BERT" to get a 4 week trial - includes postage and a digital scale.
